metadata.title: CVE-2021-47307 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: cifs:prevent NULL deref in cifs_compose_mount_options() The optional @refparameter might contain an NULL node_name, so prevent dereferencing it incifs_compose_mount_options(). Addresses-Coverity: 1476408 ("Explicit nulldereferenced")

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
